workData.title: How We Works
workData.slogan: Water is a non-profit organization bringing clean and safe drinking water to people in developing countries

features.title: We prove every project
features.description: We track every dollar you raise, and show the projects you helped fund with photos.

features.title: We’re an open book
features.description: We’ve consistently received the highest grades available for accountability.

features.title: 100% goes to the field
features.description: Private donors cover our operating costs so 100% of your money can fund water projects.
